pullRequest.title: EQL: Allow requests with size 0
pullRequest.bodyText:
The purpose for this change is to allow validation of queries without
having to actually execute them. The optimizer already picks up this
case.
Fix #62494

commit.message:
EQL: Allow requests with size 0

The purpose for this change is to allow validation of queries without
having to actually execute them. The optimizer already picks up this
case.

Fix #62494

nodes.bodyText: Shouldn't this be size and not fetchSize?
Shouldn't this be randomIntBetween(0, Integer.MAX_VALUE)? or maybe to cover better the 0 scenario - a randomBoolean() to choose between size 0 and size between 1 and MAX.

commit.message:
Address feedback
Fix test due to usage of "
Add size/fetchSize to SearchRequest
